div.p: This guide will show you how to install and begin working with Intel® Time Coordinated Computing Tools (Intel® TCC Tools).

The recommended environment for using Intel® TCC Tools consists of a host system for development tasks and a target system with supported hardware platform for application deployment and execution. You can also use a supported platform for both host and target tasks, but this is beyond the scope of this guide.

You will walk through how to set up a host system and a target system. The host system is a Linux* machine. The target system is a reference implementation, consisting of a supported Intel hardware platform, reference BIOS, and Yocto Project*-based OS. For more details and alternatives, see the Developer Guide.
Use the navigation menu to the left to begin, starting with Prerequisites.
